name: Kari Traa Rose Pants - Women's
description: Maximum warmth for cold days, the Kari Traa Rose Pant help you build your defense against heat-sneaking winter. The pure merino fabric is super-fine, soft and offers complete freedom of movement. The knit rose pattern and contrasting seams? Just a nod to their hometown of Trysil, Norway.240-denier merino wool has 4-way stretch for unrestricted motion.Fabric wicks moisture to keep you dry and is naturally antimicrobial for comfort and odour management.180-denier side panels add breathability.Elastic waistband for an all-day snug fit.
